sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PDF_G207M ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , TOT_PRE_YEAR_SUM , TOT_CURR_YEAR_SUM , RESID , GNRL_SUM , TDMR_SUM , TRP_SUM , ISLD_SUM , TOT_SUM , TFHY_GNRL_SUM , TFHY_TDMR_SUM , TFHY_TRP_SUM , TFHY_ISLD_SUM , TFHY_TOT_SUM , SHFY_GNRL_SUM , SHFY_TDMR_SUM , SHFY_TRP_SUM , SHFY_ISLD_SUM , SHFY_TOT_SUM , TDMR_TOT_PRE_YEAR_SUM , TDMR_TOT_CURR_YEAR_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #totPreYearSum# , #totCurrYearSum# , #resid# , #gnrlSum# , #tdmrSum# , #trpSum# , #isldSum# , #totSum# , #tfhyGnrlSum# , #tfhyTdmrSum# , #tfhyTrpSum# , #tfhyIsldSum# , #tfhyTotSum# , #shfyGnrlSum# , #shfyTdmrSum# , #shfyTrpSum# , #shfyIsldSum# , #shfyTotSum# , #tdmrTotPreYearSum# , #tdmrTotCurrYearSum# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PDF_G207M A SET A.TOT_CURR_YEAR_SUM = (SELECT SUM(NVL(B.CASH_CARD_SUM,0)) FROM PDF_G207Y B WHERE B.DAT_CD = 'G0013' AND B.RESID = A.RESID AND B.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND B.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND B.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND B.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND B.PDF_DAT_APP_YN = 'Y') WHERE A.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND A.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND A.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND A.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PDF_G207M WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CASH_CARD_SEIL_NUM , CHAH_USE_AMT_MN , CASH_MM_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_G207M WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CASH_CARD_SEIL_NUM=#cashCardSeilNum# AND CHAH_USE_AMT_MN=#chahUseAmtMn#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CASH_CARD_SEIL_NUM , CHAH_USE_AMT_MN , CASH_MM_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_G207M WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , CASH_CARD_SEIL_NUM DESC , CHAH_USE_AMT_MN DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PDF_G207M WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
